function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Simulated results from OccSim are not yet validated","Impact":"Inaccurate simulation results may lead to ineffective disease propagation mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Validate the simulation results by comparing them to known outbreak scenarios or higher resolution CFD simulations","Technologies":"Validation tools, data collection and analysis software","People":"Researchers, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Failure to consider airflow in the built environment","Impact":"Inability to evaluate HVAC design and scheduling for disease transmission mitigation","Mitigation":"Incorporate airflow analysis into the simulation system, conduct CFD simulations for airflow assessment","Technologies":"CFD software, airflow simulation tools","People":"Building designers, HVAC engineers, public health officials","Owner":"Architectural firms, HVAC companies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of crowd behavior model in the simulation","Impact":"Inability to account for the effect of crowd behaviors on virus transmission","Mitigation":"Develop a crowd behavior model for the simulation system, integrate queuing and grouping behaviors into the model","Technologies":"Behavior modeling software, queuing and grouping algorithms","People":"Public health officials, event planners, venue managers","Owner":"Public health organizations, event planning companies"}]}
